accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.introduction: Visio is committed to making its digital services accessible, in accordance with Article 47 of Law No. 2005-102 of February 11, 2005.
accessibility.scope: This accessibility statement applies to the website visio.numerique.gouv.fr

complianceStatus.title: Compliance Status
complianceStatus.body: visio.numerique.gouv.fr is not compliant with RGAA 4.1. The site has not yet been audited. However, the team strives to create a site that is accessible to everyone by following RGAA recommendations.

improvement.title: Improvement and Contact
improvement.body: If you cannot access content or a service, you can contact the person responsible for lasuite.numerique.gouv.fr to be directed to an accessible alternative or to obtain the content in another form.

improvement.response: We try to respond within 2 working days.

recourse.title: Means of Recourse
recourse.introduction: This procedure is to be used in the following case: you have reported to the website manager an accessibility issue that prevents you from accessing content or one of the portal's services, and you have not received a satisfactory response.

options.option1: Write a message to the Rights Defender
options.option2: Contact the Rights Defender's representative in your region
options.option3: Send a letter by mail (free, no stamp needed): </br> Rights Defender Free response 71120 75342 Paris CEDEX 07
